functionAppName: Name of the function app resource
storageAccountName: Name of the storage account resource used by the azure functions and web app resources
cosmosAccountName: Name of the cosmos db instance used by the app
ifrcGoHost: Host name of the IFRC GO api. Expected to include the protocol (should be 'https://')
microsoftAppId: Id of the app registration used the bot registration service
microsoftAppPassword: Password for the app registration used by the bot registration service
jsonWebTokenSignature: Arbitrary value (guid, etc.) used to sign json web tokens for api authorization. Changing this will invalidate all active client sessions. This is highly sensitive, and if leaked it can be used to impersonate any user.
